name: get_4_date_endpoint
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool currenciesexchangerateapi.
Tool description: CurrenciesRatesAPI is a RESTful API that provides currency conversion and exchange rate information.This API is organized around REST. Our API has predictable resource-oriented URLs, accepts form-encoded request bodies, returns JSON-encoded responses.
API description: Request Parameters:
'date': 
'symbols': 
'base': 
Response: This endpoint returns the exchange rates for the specified currencies on the specified date in JSON format.

base.description: The base currency for which to get the exchange rates.

symbols.description: A comma-separated string of target currencies to get exchange rates for.

date.description: The date for which to fetch the exchange rates in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format. Defaults to '2023-02-01'.
